docs.snippet: The Houston Astros expect to be somewhat better than last year, but they are waiting on a stable of minor-league talent for a true payoff in coming years....

docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that Houston Astros expect to be somewhat better than in 2013, but they are waiting on a stable of minor-league talent for true payoff in the coming years; are preparing to face New York Yankees on opening day.

docs.lead_paragraph: Freshly painted logos on the field. Large American flags unfurled in pre-game ceremonies. Fans with painted faces hoping this is their team's year.
